## Provider class

data provider

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Provider 
```

## Remarks

provides access to the data hosted at [https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19](https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19)

## Example


```ts
import Provider from '@gregoranders/jhu-covid19';

const main = async () => {
  const provider = new Provider();
  const model = await provider.get();

  console.log(model);
};

main();

```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get()](./jhu-covid19.provider.get.md) |  | Fetches the JHU datset, aggregates, precalculates values, diffs and averages. |
